title: "I Love You"
description:
1. Goukaku Ecchi!
2. Natsu to Jun (Summer and Innocence)
[spoiler]A simple and sweet story of two young people who like each other, but need a push from the summer festival fireworks to take things to the next level.[/spoiler]
3. Koiseyo Otome
4. Kago no Mushi, Kumo o Shitau.
5. Daisuki. (I Love You.)
6. Kitto Onee-chan Yori...  (No Doubt, Even Better Than Sis...)
7. Sakyutto! (Succuties)
8. Nanka Ii Koto Atta? (Did Something Good Happen?)
[spoiler]Mini non-hentai sequel
[url]https://twitter.com/freeskecth555/status/1062743916296921089[/url][/spoiler]
9. Danchou, Onegaishimasu!
10. [url=https://mangadex.org/title/44086/will-you-marry-me]Will you marry me?[/url]
